name: Fogwood
description:
Submission for the HexaJam!

!!Press F to full screen the browser version

We will be adding the .zip version in a couple of hours, so be patient if the browser version runs into a bug.

Controls: Spacebar to progress story and Left Mouse-Click to move around.

This is a story of a brave girl who must venture into a cursed forest in order to save her sister's life. Her survival is up to you, based on the moves you make inside the forest and the creatures that inhabit it.

Credits:

Talented coding done by Yammmmmy

Artistic design drawn by frodoTimBaku
